basic.name: Gilnean Cocktail (Q)
basic.description: Hurl a flask that deals 55 damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 220 damage to enemies in a cone behind them.
basic.quest: {highlight}Every time Greymane hits an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail, increase its explosion damage by 12.5, up to 375.{/highlight}
rewards: {highlight}After hitting 30 Heroes: Make Gilnean Cocktail always explode at its apex.{/highlight}

basic.name: Inner Beast (W)
basic.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.

basic.name: Darkflight (E)
basic.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 damage.

basic.name: Razor Swipe (Q)
basic.description: Swipe in the targeted direction, dealing 126 damage to enemies hit.

basic.name: Disengage (E)
basic.description: Disengage Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.

heroic.name: Go for the Throat (R)
heroic.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

heroic.name: Cursed Bullet (R)
heroic.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage. Does not affect Vehicles.

trait.name: Curse of the Worgen (T)
trait.description: Greymane can use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen. While Human, Greymane's Basic Attacks are ranged. While Worgen, Greymane gains 10 Armor, and his Basic Attacks become melee but deal 40% more damage.

1.name: Wolfheart
1.description: {highlight}Activate to transform into Human, parrying Basic Attacks for the next 0.75 seconds. If at least one Basic Attack was parried, refreshes Gilnean Cocktail's cooldown.{/highlight}

1.name: Perfect Aim
1.description: {highlight}Gilnean Cocktail reduces enemy healing by 60% for 3 seconds on explosion damage and refunds 45 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.{/highlight}

1.name: Viciousness
1.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

4.name: Thick Skin
4.description: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

4.name: All Fours
4.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to reduce the cooldown of Healing Fountain by 0.5 seconds. {highlight} Activate to transform into Worgen instantly and receive a 50% Movement Speed bonus for 4 seconds. If you attack or cast any skill, you will lose the bonus.{/highlight}

7.name: Quicksilver Bullets
7.description: Increases Greymane's Human Basic Attack range by 1.1.

7.name: Gilnean War Training
7.description: {highlight}Activate to instantly transform into Human, performing a kick at the target Hero. This will knock back the enemy Hero, dealing 85 damage and stunning for 0.5 seconds if they collide with a wall. While in Worgen Form, Greymane has partial vision of enemy Heroes and traps close to him.{/highlight}

7.name: Wizened Duelist
7.description: Quest: Every 6 Human Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Basic Attack damage by 1%, up to 30%. Worgen Basic Attacks grant credit for 3 Basic Attacks. Half of this bonus is lost upon death.

10.name: Go for the Throat
10.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

10.name: Cursed Bullet
10.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage. Does not affect Vehicles.

13.name: Running Wild
13.description: {highlight}Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%. Basic Attacks reduce Darkflight and Disengage's cooldowns by 1 second.{/highlight}

13.name: Unfettered Assault
13.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%, and Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1.5 seconds. {highlight}Passive: After using Desingage heals Greymane 15% of his maximum health{/highlight}

13.name: On the Prowl
13.description: Inner Beast increases Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds. {highlight}Receives 10% stacking Movement Speed for 3 seconds when hitting enemy Heroes recently affected by Gilnean Cocktail.{/highlight}

16.name: Eager Wolf
16.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Alpha Killer
16.description: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Unleashed
20.description: {highlight}After taking fatal damage, Greymane enters a frenzy state in Worgen Form. During this state, he rapidly loses health, gains 150% Movement Speed, and can only use Go for the Throat whose cooldown is reset. If Greymane kills an enemy Hero while in this state, he returns to normal.{/highlight}
passives: Go for the Throat's damage is increased by 25%

20.name: Gilnean Roulette
20.description: {highlight}Cursed Bullet destroys the target's resistance on the bullet-affected area, making every projectile and Basic Attack ignore armor in that direction for 3 seconds.{/highlight}

20.name: Worgen Arsenal
20.description: {highlight}Toggle between two attack modes: Blunderbuss (Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target) or Tooth and Claw (Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage and increase Razor Swipe's damage by 100%).{/highlight}

20.name: Hunting Area
20.description: {highlight}Greymane marks an area around him as a Hunting Area after 1 second. Enemy Heroes in that area will have their vision reduced, and allied Heroes will have a 15% damage bonus. The area lasts 6 seconds.{/highlight}
